sentences.english: Even so, Kaifeng Jews say they weren't singled out for discrimination.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，開封猶太人說他們並沒有遭到歧視對待。

sentences.english: Kaifeng, the capital of Song Dynasty, was divided into several compartments, each with its own characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 宋都開封分爲數廂，每廂各有特點。

sentences.english: Click to read the original, into the city of Kaifeng education system kindergarten micro website.
sentences.chinese: 點擊閱讀原文，進入開封市教育系統幼兒園微網站。

sentences.english: My irregular periods, in Kaifeng have seen a lot of doctors do not work.
sentences.chinese: 我的月經不調，在開封看了很多醫生都不起作用。

sentences.chinese: 這個就是“開封金鼎投資擔保有限公司”地英文。

sentences.chinese: 我有一套刪節過的兒童版，也許我該開封。

sentences.english: Visitors walk over a bridge in the Millennium City Park in Kaifeng, central China's Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 遊客經過一座拱橋進入開封清明上河園景區。

sentences.english: We recommend uncorking 45 minutes before serving.
Not accept replacment once cosumer goods was opened or damaged.

sentences.english: The evolution of Henan University went with modern city transition of Kaifeng.

sentences.english: With the ancient capital of Kaifeng Liuniao the representation of folk.
sentences.chinese: 開封遛鳥所具有的古都民俗的代表性分析。

sentences.english: Today, Kaifeng Jews tread with caution.
sentences.chinese: 如今，開封猶太人如履薄冰。

sentences.english: The night market is a epitome of local people's life style .
sentences.chinese: 夜市是開封人生活的一個縮影。

sentences.english: Kaifeng also on the famous Qingming River Park, I think it has to be very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 開封還有著名的清明上河園，我想那一定非常的漂亮。

sentences.english: I always recommend that you use up any coffee you buy within a week of opening the package.
sentences.chinese: 我建議最好開封一個星期以內就把所有咖啡喝光。
